name: ClickOnceMore-PS-Build
description: Build a ClickOnceMore project to publish ClickOnce manifests
author: Red Sky Software

inputs.name: projectFile
inputs.label: Project File (.csproj)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ClickOnceMore project file (.csproj) which can be created using ClickOnceMore (www.clickoncemore.net)

inputs.name: buildLicence
inputs.label: Build Licence
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your ClickOnceMore build licence. Email support@redskysoftware.com for more info

inputs.name: configuration
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: This will replace the [DebugOrRelease] macro with the value 'Release' or 'Debug' in all macro affected fields.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the application version specified in the project file. Version must be in the form x.x.x.x (Major, Minor, Release, Build). This uses the given version to build the ClickOnce manifests as well as using the given version to replace the [ProductVersion] macro.

inputs.name: macroScheme
inputs.label: Macro Scheme
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the macro scheme to be used for this build. This ensures that all macros will be replaced by the values for the named scheme. If the specified macro scheme does not exist, or does not have a value for a given macro, default values will be used.

inputs.name: macroValues
inputs.label: Macro Values
inputs.helpMarkDown: One override per line in format name=value. Override the macro 'name' with 'value' for this build. One /mv will be added to command line per line. This allows you to override the value of an individual macro instead of an entire scheme.

inputs.name: outputDirectory
inputs.label: Output Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the output directory used by the project. This will cause the ClickOnce manifests to be built to the specified location, rather than the output directory set in the project.

inputs.name: deploymentManifestFilename
inputs.label: Deployment Manifest Filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the deployment manifest filename. This will cause the ClickOnce deployment manifest to be built with the specified filename, rather than the filename set in the project.

inputs.name: applicationManifestFilename
inputs.label: Application Manifest Filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the application manifest filename. This will cause the ClickOnce application manifest to be built with the specified filename, rather than the filename set in the project.

inputs.name: deploymentUrl
inputs.label: Deployment URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the deployment URL (the URL the application will be deployed from). This overrides the setting specified in the project file.

inputs.name: signingCertificateFilename
inputs.label: Signing Certificate Filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the signing certificate filename to use a different certificate than the one specified in the project file. You can also override the password and timestamp URL for the certificate.

inputs.name: signingCertificatePassword
inputs.label: Signing Certificate Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the signing certificate password.

inputs.name: signingCertificateTimestamp
inputs.label: Signing Certificate Timestamp
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the signing certificate URL timestamp.

inputs.name: useDotDeploy
inputs.label: Use .deploy File Extensions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the value of 'Use .deploy file extensions'. See Project Properties for more details.

inputs.name: allowUrlParams
inputs.label: Allow URL Params
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the value of 'Allow URL params to be passed to application'. See Advanced for more details.

inputs.name: availableOffline
inputs.label: Available Offline
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the value of 'Make application available to users offline and online'. See Advanced for more details.

inputs.name: multipleUrls
inputs.label: Multiple URLs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the value of 'Allow Multiple URLs (exclude installation path from manifest)'. See Advanced for more details.

inputs.name: regFreeCom
inputs.label: Reg Free COM
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the value of 'Retain reg-free COM details from existing manifest file'. See Advanced for more details.

inputs.name: desktopShortcut
inputs.label: Desktop Shortcut
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the value of 'Create desktop shortcut'. See Advanced for more details.

inputs.name: blockUrlActivation
inputs.label: Block URL Activation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the value of 'Block application from being activated via a URL'. See Advanced for more details.

inputs.name: signManifests
inputs.label: Sign Manifests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the value of 'Sign ClickOnce manifests'. See Signing for more details.

inputs.name: enableUpdates
inputs.label: Enable Updates
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the value of 'Enable ClickOnce automatic updates'. See Automatic Updates for more details.

inputs.name: additionalCommandLineArgs
inputs.label: Additional Command Line Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Value of this input will be appended to the final command line for running ClickOnceMore.
